class_features.name: Fighting Style
class_features.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty. Choose a fighting style from the list of optional features. You canâ€™t take the same Fighting Style option more than once, even if you get to choose again.

class_features.name: Extra Attack
class_features.description: Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

class_features.name: Neurotoxic Weapons
class_features.description: You have learned to treat your weapons with a special chemical designed to disconnect a creature from its neural augmentation. Beginning at 10th level you deal an additional 1d6 psychic damage to the first creature you hit with a melee or ranged weapon attack a turn.
